Articles.Content: It wouldn't be hard to implement I imagine. I would simply like a feature that would allow me to sort contracts by particular features, like due date, pay out, location, and type. That way I can elect to perform them in the order of my choosing.

On an additional note, Subfolders would be nice. For example, as I collect satellite missions for Duna, I'd like to stick them off in a side folder until my launch window is actually open and I can ship them TO Duna to do something with them. Seems like it'd be in the same UI cleanup, so just tossing this in behind Maelstrom's idea, which would be nice too.
